attributes.action: stop the brutal slaughter of the UK population of Ruddy Duck with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plans made, and currently in process, to cull the Ruddy Duck are cruel and senseless. Killing one species of duck, whose only crime has been to mate with another - amounts to species racism, and must not be allowed to happen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
